short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to filter items on alza.sk/cz based on the value of discount.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables filtering items based on discount value on alza.sk/cz. Only items that are equal to or higher than the selected value will be displayed.
